title: How to Make Cake Batter Ice Cream

steps.headline: Pre-freeze the ice cream maker freezer bowl.
steps.description: Leave it in there while you're making the recipe, so it will be very cold when you're ready to use it.

steps.headline: Carefully whisk the milk and sugar together in a medium bowl.
Add the heavy cream and vanilla extract.
Add and stir the cake mix in.
steps.description: Continue whisking until no lumps are seen.

steps.headline: Pour the ice cream mixture into the freezer bowl.
Use the ice cream maker to mix and blend it until thickened, about 25 to 30 minutes.
Add the newly made ice cream to a separate freezer-safe container.

text: Pre-freeze the ice cream maker freezer bowl. Leave it in there while you're making the recipe, so it will be very cold when you're ready to use it. Carefully whisk the milk and sugar together in a medium bowl.  Add the heavy cream and vanilla extract. Stir thoroughly. Add and stir the cake mix in. Continue whisking until no lumps are seen. Pour the ice cream mixture into the freezer bowl.  Use the ice cream maker to mix and blend it until thickened, about 25 to 30 minutes.  Add the newly made ice cream to a separate freezer-safe container. Freeze until ready to serve. Finished.
